product_name: Hammer Nutrition Energy Gel - Single Serving
long_description: Get clean, consistent and long-burning energy with this complex carbohydrate gel that won't cause insulin spikes and tastes great. Proprietary Energy Smart(R) blend of long-chain complex carbohydrates delivers smooth, sustained energy release. Can be used straight, diluted or as a flavoring for complete versatility. Consume before, during and after workouts for more endurance and quicker recovery from exertion. Specifications based on a range of flavors; nutrition facts displayed here and on wrapper may differ; information on wrapper reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Get clean, consistent and long-burning energy with this complex carbohydrate gel that won't cause insulin spikes and tastes great.
